title: How do I get a refund from a champion I don't like
body: Hi, I heard you can get a refund if you didn't like a champion you recently purchased but how?

replies.body:
Content is refundable if you've purchased it within the last **90 days** and it is one of the following:

>* Champions
* Skins
* Runes
* Rune Pages
* Summoner Name Changes
* Ward Skins
* Summoner Icons
* Chroma Packs
* Individual Chroma Skins

If you're out of refund tokens, then you won't have another option to refund the item. These tokens serve as the only exception to our [*No refund policy.*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h1) I strongly recommend trying champs out during their free weeks prior to purchasing them to prevent having to use a refund token on one. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

To refund a recent purchase, you'll need to go to the store, click on the "Account" button in the top right, then click "Purchase History," and you you should be able to refund recent purchases from there.

If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
I did your instructions, however it says "non-refundable" But I bought it on 10/12/2016. Is there any way?

There's a few reasons why it would say non-refundable:

1.) You don't have any remaining refunds left. Each account is given 3 refunds, and once you use them up, that's it. The number of refunds you have remaining will be in the top left when in the Purchase History screen.

2.) You received the champion in a non-refundable way. Currently, you can only refund something you personally purchased with either RP or IP. If you obtained it through Hextech Crafting, a self-bought Mystery Gift, or a gift from someone else, then unfortunately you will be unable to refund it.

3.) You own a skin for the champion. If you own a skin for the champion, then you will need to refund the skin first before refunding the champion.

Hopefully this clears things up. Unfortunately, unless reason 3 is the case for you, then I don't think you will be able to refund the champion.

EDIT: There may be other reasons why it would say "non-refundable" that I'm forgetting, so if I think of anything else, I will post them here.

It says I have no more refunds left, is there a way I can get more? or refund it anyway?

I probably haven't used a refund since 2013.
Unfortunately, there is no way to get more refunds, and there is currently no other way to refund a purchase.
